author: Simon Difford
description: Subtle passion fruit flavour and tartness influence rather than dominate this Margarita, allowing the tequila and other ingredients to also shine. Fruity yet sophisticated.
name: Passion Fruit Margarita

recipeInstructions.text: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop out the flesh from one half into your shaker (retain the other half for garnish)
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice, and fine strain into chilled glass
